00028 #ifndef _UserObjectsBinding_H__
00029 #define _UserObjectsBinding_H__
00030 
00031 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00032 #include "OgreAny.h"
00033 
00034 namespace Ogre {
00035 
00048     class _OgreExport UserObjectBindings : public GeneralAllocatedObject
00049     {
00050     public: 
00052         UserObjectBindings();
00053 
00055         virtual ~UserObjectBindings();
00056 
00066         void setUserAny(const Any& anything);
00067 
00070         const Any& getUserAny(void) const;
00071 
00080         void setUserAny(const String& key, const Any& anything);
00081 
00087         const Any& getUserAny(const String& key) const;
00088 
00092         void eraseUserAny(const String& key);
00093 
00095         void clear() const;
00096 
00099         static const Any& getEmptyUserAny() { return msEmptyAny; }
00100 
00101     // Types.
00102     protected:      
00103         typedef map<String, Any>::type          UserObjectsMap;
00104         typedef UserObjectsMap::iterator        UserObjectsMapIterator;
00105         typedef UserObjectsMap::const_iterator  UserObjectsMapConstIterator;
00106 
00109         class Attributes : public GeneralAllocatedObject
00110         {
00111         public:
00113             Attributes() : mpUserObjectsMap(NULL) {}
00114 
00116             ~Attributes()
00117             {
00118                 if (mpUserObjectsMap != NULL)
00119                 {
00120                     OGRE_DELETE mpUserObjectsMap;
00121                     mpUserObjectsMap = NULL;
00122                 }               
00123             }
00124 
00125             Any                 mKeylessAny;        // Will hold key less associated user object for fast access.   
00126             UserObjectsMap*     mpUserObjectsMap;   // Will hold a map between user keys to user objects.
00127         };
00128 
00129     // Attributes.
00130     private:
00131         static Any              msEmptyAny;         // Shared empty any object.
00132         mutable Attributes*     mAttributes;        // Class attributes - will be allocated on demand.
00133         
00134     };
00135 
00138 }
00139 
00140 #endif
